articles.author: Ritu Sharma
articles.title: Standing Up To China’s PLA – How Indian General Foiled Beijing’s ‘Salami-Slicing’ In Arunachal Pradesh In 1987 - EurAsian Times
articles.description: China has been ratcheting up the dispute over India’s northeastern province of Arunachal Pradesh. Beijing’s audacity in asserting its claim over the Indian state has evoked a strong reaction from the US, which said it “strongly deplored” China’s unilateral te…
